name: grassy-surge

effect.sun_moon: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to grassy terrain.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to grassy terrain.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to grassy terrain.

short_effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Grassy Terrain.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
